title: learnR style quizzes in plain javascript
text: basic example shows set quiz. Check Basic usage see rendered example.
code: library(niceQuiz)  quiz(caption = "",   question("What is the collective term for Windows, MacOS, Unix, *etc.*?",     answer("Operating system", correct = TRUE),     answer("Graphical user interface"),     answer("Integrated development environment"),     answer("Secondary computing software")   ),   question("What is R?",     answer("A high-level programming language", correct = TRUE),     answer("An IDE for Windows and MacOS"),     answer("Machine code for RStudio"),     answer("Baby don't hurt me.")   ),   question("How many panes does RStudio contain?",     answer("1"),     answer("2"),     answer("3"),     answer("4", correct = TRUE)   ),   question("Which one is NOT a feature of a good algorithm?",     answer("There are no infinite loops."),     answer("Instructions are clearly explained."),     answer("Individual steps are simple."),     answer("It is linear.", correct = TRUE)   ) )
